thread.title: Adarsh slams ton in drawn tie
thread.title_full: Adarsh slams ton in drawn tie

title: Adarsh slams ton in drawn tie
text:
Adarsh slams ton in drawn tie Adarsh slams ton in drawn tie October 17,2015,Bengaluru, DHNS 
Adarsh Prajwal smashed an unbeaten 160 in Secretary’s XI’s drawn game against Dharwad Zone in the KSCA inter-zonal under-16 cricket tournament here. Powered by Adarsh’s knock, which came off just 179 balls, Secretary’s XI made 329 in their first innings and then bowled out Dharwad for 278 in their first knock. Secretary’s XI were 119 for one in their second knock when play ended, fetching them three points for their first innings lead.In another match, Shubang Hegde picked up six wickets as Bangalore Zone drew with Combined City XI. Advaith Jayaram claimed five for 33 to help Combined City bowl out Bangalore for 98 but the latter battled hard in the second innings to earn a point.Brief scores: At Alur-3: Secretary’s XI: 329 all out in 90 overs (Aqib Javeed 27, Tejas J 45, Adarsh Prajwal 160 n.o (179 balls, 27 X 4), Veerendra S 2/57, Rohit V 2/41, Sujay M 3/77) and 119/ 1 in 32 overs (Danish M 51 n.o, Munim Moosa Mehdi 58 n.o) drew with Dharwad Zone: 278 all out in 80 overs (Sudhanwa U 45, Puneet S 28, Shivam S 46, Veerendra S 45, Chetan B 40, Sidharth Madhavan 3/48, Raghav Khandelwal 4/59). Secretary XI: 3 points, Dharwad Zone: 1 point.At Alur-1: Vice-President’s XI: 281/8 in 90 overs (Nitin S 83, Mohit Verma 87, Sai Prajwal Reddy 50, Vinay Murgesh 2/74, Ankush Merecha 4/25) and 112 all out in 34 overs (Udbhav Gaurav 36, Siris S Patil 2/33, Ritwik Ramesh 5/13, Vinay Murgesh 2/11) drew with President’s XI: 252 all out in 80.4 overs (Rohan Patil 72, Luvnith S Sisodia 103 n.o (129 balls, 10 X 4), Daniel Joplin 5/54, Tarun Kishore Chandan 2/49). Vice-President’s XI: 3 points, President’s XI: 1 point.At Alur-2: Raichur Zone: 114 all out in 43.5 overs (Ajay Gowda 25, Gaurav Narayan 2/17, Rishab Belavadi 2/9, Aman Khan 2/6, Sudhanshu Sonkar 3/18) and 208/ 7 in 85 overs (Ajay Gowda 38, Lingaraj Patil 65, Vijay Reddy 41 n.o, Sudhanshu Sonkar 4/51) drew with Bangalore City: 277 all out in 81.4 overs (Saideep Ganesh 45, Sudhanshu Sonkar 67, Pranav 31, Adithyan Kumaran 47 n.o, Vidyadhar Patil 4/101, Girish Matpati 5/32). Bangalore City: 3 points, Raichur Zone: 1 point.At IAF: Shimoga Zone: 68 all out in 29 overs (Mubarak 27, Sonith Kotian 2/26, Prateek Rao 5/3) and 261/6 in 101 overs (Prajwal P Gowda 40, Akash NR Sharma 30, Mubarak 41, Nrushal BR 54 n.o, Sonith Kotian 3/52) drew with Mangalore Zone: 205 all out in 68.2 overs (Prateek Rao 111 (193 balls, 14 X 4), Prajwal Gowda 5/28). Mangalore Zone: 3 points, Shimoga Zone: 1 point.Bangalore Zone: 98 all out in 51.1 overs (Jeswanth Acharya 41, Advaith Jayaram 5/33) and 171/ 4 in 59 overs (Jeswanth Acharya 86, Premnath J 36) drew with Combined City XI: 233/ 9 in 90 overs (Rohan Nayakar 52, Aneesh KV 51, Tanish Mahesh 48 n.o, Shubhang Hegde 6/79). Combined City XI 3 points and Bangalore Zone 1 point.At RWF: Mysore Zone: 270/ 8 in 90 overs (Venkatesh M 111 (264 balls, 17 X 4), Lokesh LR 33, Amruth Raj D 52, Sanjay VN 2/44, Manoj Banakar 2/39) and 45/1 in 13 overs (Hemanth Kumar L 27 n.o) drew with Tumkur Zone: 251 all out in 87 overs (Chaitra Vardhan 120 (200 balls, 16 X 4), Saathvik Shyamnur 3/39, Hemanth Kumar L 4/63, Harsha BS 2/45). Mysore Zone: 3 points and Tumkur Zone: 1 point.
